message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase a unique product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to start the conversation with a price of $15000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm on a tight budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something we can work with?

I understand that you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I have to make a living too. I can see that you're interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to lower the price to $12000, which is the minimum I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit far from comfortable. I'm willing to meet you at $10500. Can you consider that?

I can see that you're getting closer to a comfortable price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $11500. This is my final offer, so I hope you can see the value in the product at this price.
Alice, I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not convinced that the product is worth $11500 to me. I'm willing to meet you at $10000. Can you consider that?

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I've already made a significant concession. I'm not willing to go any lower than $11500. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a premium warranty and dedicated support for the product. This is my final offer, so I hope you can see the value in the product at this price.
Alice, I appreciate the extras, but I'm still not willing to pay $11500. I'm willing to meet you at $9800. Can you consider that?

I'm starting to get concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much on the deal. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. I'm not willing to go any lower than that.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with $11000. I'm willing to meet you at $9500. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from another seller.
